trans-unit.source: Used to provide design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: 用于在可视化设计器的设计时支持<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"> </xref> Web 服务器控件。

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 在可视化设计器中，当从源视图切换到设计视图中，标记源代码描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件进行分析，并在设计图面上创建控件的设计时版本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 当你切换回源视图时，设计时控件的标记源代码持久保存，并编辑向网页上的标记。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ButtonDesigner"></xref> class.

The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ButtonDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control or a copy of that control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 内部构造的新实例<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ButtonDesigner>类时创建关联<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控件或该控件的设计图面上的副本。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ButtonDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于在设计时呈现关联的控件的标记。

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method replaces the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> property with the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> control if the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> contains no displayable characters.
trans-unit.target: GetDesignTimeHtml 方法替换<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>具有属性<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A>属性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button>控制如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>不包含任何可显示的字符。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ID%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, the GetDesignTimeHtml method calls its base method, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>, which calls into the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to generate the markup.
trans-unit.target: 然后，GetDesignTimeHtml 方法调用其基方法， <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>，其中调入<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法来生成标记。</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderControl%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the markup used to render the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref> at design time.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含用于呈现的标记<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button"></xref>在设计时。</xref:System.String>
